name: CORONAVIRUS Vs. WORLD
description:
* FIRST PLAYER TO COMPLETE THE GAME WILL BE CREDITED IN NEXT VERSION
* IF YOU WANT A COUNTRY TO BE ADDED, POST YOUR DEMAND.
* HELP THE GAME BECOMING POPULAR BY POSTING COMMENTS OR SHARING.

----------------------------------

INSTRUCTIONS:

* Use W,A,S,D or ARROWS to MOVE DEFENSES.
* Defenses will automatically attack virus on the way.
* CLICK on screen (or [Ctrl]) to gather all defenses together.
* CLICK on one virus to order: ATTACK.
* CLICK on one CELL to order: DEFEND.
* CLICK on MEDICINE button to inject some defenses.
* CLICK on Bubbles to make em' explode!

DEFEAT CORONAVIRUS ALONG 6 STAGES!!

----------------------------------

IF YOU LIKE THE GAME, GIVE A LIKE!
THAT HELPS, THANKS!!!
----------------------------------

----------------------------------
WORK IN PROGRESS!

- Still can be added more stages.
